title: Vehicular SATCOM
explain: Vehicular SATCOM is a communication On-the-pause vehicular station, which is used as an integrated communication platform for emergency communication system support, as well as video live broadcastings, and also having functions of on-site integrated communication and dispatching.
features:
Features

  • On-the-pause transmission of BLOS, multiple-service, large capacity and high quality service;
  • Three types of station: large size, medium size and small size, the antenna aperture is optional;
  • As an important mean of emergency communication mean with good maneuverability, and fast deployment and commissioning.
form:
Specifications
Operation FrequencyKu/Ka
Antenna Aperture1.2m～3.7m
Power Amplifier4W～100W (optional)
Data Rate64kbps~8Mbps
Service TypeVoice, data and image
